member.summary: A simple HTTP service for making GET requests and retrieving the response content.

member.name: M:KWiJisho.Models.Apis.HttpService.GetAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String)
member.summary: Sends an asynchronous GET request to the specified URI and returns the response content as a string.
member.param: The HttpClient instance to use for the request.
The URI of the resource to request.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The result contains the response content as a string.
